title: Birdlovers of New South Wales: the story of the Gould League
creator_credit: Australian Instructional Films and Lex Halliday
brief_description: This film tells the story of the foundation and growth of the Gould League of Birdlovers, who study, watch and protect native birds. Photography by Harry Malcolm with majority of bird shots by Norman Chaffer. Commentary by David Low.
title_for_label: Birdlovers of New South Wales: the story of the Gould League
